name: BlackScholes
description: BlackScholes. Contract to compute the black scholes price of options. Where the unit is unspecified, it should be treated as a PRECISE_DECIMAL, which has 1e27 units of precision. The default decimal matches the ethereum standard of 1e18 units of precision.

functionDecorators.name: abs
functionDecorators.description: Returns absolute value of an int as a uint.

functionDecorators.name: exp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the exponent of the value using taylor expansion with range reduction.

functionDecorators.name: exp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the exponent of the value using taylor expansion with range reduction, with support for negative numbers.

functionDecorators.name: optionPrices
functionDecorators.description: Returns call and put prices for options with given parameters.

parameterDecorators.name: timeToExpirySec
parameterDecorators.description: Number of seconds to the expiry of the option.

parameterDecorators.name: volatilityDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: Implied volatility over the period til expiry as a percentage.

parameterDecorators.name: spotDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: The current price of the base asset.

parameterDecorators.name: strikeDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: The strike price of the option.

parameterDecorators.name: rateDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: The percentage risk free rate + carry cost.

functionDecorators.name: pricesDeltaStdVega
functionDecorators.description: Returns call/put prices and delta/stdVega for options with given parameters.

parameterDecorators.name: timeToExpirySec
parameterDecorators.description: Number of seconds to the expiry of the option.

parameterDecorators.name: volatilityDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: Implied volatility over the period til expiry as a percentage.

parameterDecorators.name: spotDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: The current price of the base asset.

parameterDecorators.name: strikeDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: The strike price of the option.

parameterDecorators.name: rateDecimal
parameterDecorators.description: The percentage risk free rate + carry cost.

functionDecorators.name: sqrt
functionDecorators.description: Returns the square root of the value using Newton's method. This ignores the unit, so numbers should be multiplied by their unit before being passed in.
